message: Your split seems a little unbalanced to me. How about a bit closer to 50/50?
I'll meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer.
Time is running out, and the value is decreasing.  I'm proposing a slightly better split to try and find a compromise.
Considering the decreasing value, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The deal is getting worse for both of us.  Meet me in the middle or we both lose!
